name: The Longest Harvest
description:
This is quite literally the longest harvest. 

You will need to carve out 3 weeks of real time to beat this game.

Follow the audio cues and keep your plant alive in order to become a master farmer!

This was made specifically for the Extra Credits Game Jam #5. The theme was "Passage". Big thanks to Mafon2 of Freesound.org for his "Water Click" sound effect and text2speech.org, as it was very late and I was too tired to record audio myself.

Programs used were Unity & Piskel.
